about.summary: replacement for argparse allowing options to be set via config files and/or env vars

name: configargparse
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "ConfigArgParse" %}
{% set version = "0.10.0" %}
{% set md5 = "408ad7af06cd449420cecc19bee6f0c9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: {{ md5 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - configargparse

about:
  home: https://github.com/zorro3/ConfigArgParse
  license: MIT
  summary: replacement for argparse allowing options to be set via config files and/or env vars
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/zorro3/ConfigArgParse
  doc_url: https://github.com/zorro3/ConfigArgParse

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - msarahan
